title: Adirondack
description: Remington navigates tensions between white land developers and the Minishonka Nation.
quote: You white men think a piece of paper means you can own Mother Earth.
creator: Cox Whitley
altHero: a man wearing a bolo tie with a Native man wearing traditional jewelry and a Native woman wearing a blanket
alt4: Native woman sheds blanket to reveal blue suit and statement turquoise necklace
